actions.addPlayer: Add new players once at a time ...
actions.addMultiplePlayers: ... or a group of players using a file

run.willStop: This will stop the current tournament and allow users to register again. WARNING: This _will_ destroy the current bracket
run.willStart: This will start the tournament and prevent users from registering.
run.willConfigure: The 'configure' button will allow you to configure your tournament further before starting it.

misc.fileMustBeCSV: file needs to be a CSV file

error.noSuchTournament: No such tournament has been registered, check your URL or go back to the main page to create a new tournament.
error.serverError: A server error has occurred, wait for a bit to retry and if nothing gets better, get in touch with the admin
error.notACSVFile: File does not seem to be a CSV file
error.noNameField: No Column for player nicks in this file. Remember that the 1st line of your CSV should define the columns. A valid 1st line here is : 'name, faction'

register.noPlayers: No registered players at the moment

errors.noDuplicateNick: A player with that name is already registered
errors.registrationLocked: You can't enter this tournament, registration is locked
errors.noSuchTournament: No such tournament has been registered, check your URL or go back to the main page to create a new tournament.

common.errorFindingMatchesToReport: An error occurred while looking up matches to be reported.

bracket.tournamentNotRunningWarning: Tournament is not currently running, please come back later!
